uncapped_liability.pattern: (no cap on liability|unlimited liability|without limit|liability shall not be limited|no limitation on liability)
uncapped_liability.explanation: Contract contains uncapped financial exposure which could result in unlimited damages

automatic_renewal.pattern: (automatic renewal|automatically renew|renew unless terminated|auto-renew|shall renew automatically)
automatic_renewal.explanation: Contract may auto-renew without explicit consent, potentially locking in unfavorable terms

unilateral_termination.pattern: (may terminate at any time|right to terminate without cause|terminate at will|terminate for convenience|terminate without notice)
unilateral_termination.explanation: Counterparty has unilateral termination rights which creates business continuity risk

broad_indemnification.pattern: (indemnify.*against all claims|indemnify.*from any and all|hold harmless.*any claims|defend.*all claims)
broad_indemnification.explanation: Broad indemnification clause may require defending against claims unrelated to your actions

ip_assignment.pattern: (assign all intellectual property|transfer all ip rights|all work product.*property of|ownership of.*work product)
ip_assignment.explanation: Clause assigns intellectual property rights which may include pre-existing or independently developed IP

non_compete.pattern: (non-compete|shall not compete|agree not to compete|restriction on competition)
non_compete.explanation: Non-compete clause may restrict future business opportunities

confidentiality_perpetual.explanation: Perpetual confidentiality obligations may be overly burdensome and difficult to manage

venue_restriction.pattern: (exclusive jurisdiction|venue shall be|courts of.*shall have exclusive|submit to jurisdiction)
venue_restriction.explanation: Venue restriction may require litigation in inconvenient or unfavorable jurisdiction

waiver_of_jury.pattern: (waive.*jury trial|waiver of jury|no jury trial|without a jury)
waiver_of_jury.explanation: Waiver of jury trial rights may limit legal remedies in disputes

liquidated_damages.explanation: Liquidated damages clause may result in disproportionate penalties for breach

unilateral_modification.pattern: (may modify.*at any time|right to change.*without notice|unilateral right to amend|modify.*sole discretion)
unilateral_modification.explanation: Counterparty can unilaterally modify terms without consent or notice

payment_terms_net_immediate.explanation: Short payment terms may create cash flow challenges

force_majeure_limited.explanation: Limited force majeure clause may not cover all unforeseeable events

warranty_disclaimer.pattern: (as is|without warranty|no warranties|disclaims all warranties|without any warranty)
warranty_disclaimer.explanation: Broad warranty disclaimer may leave you without recourse for defects or issues

consequential_damages_allowed.pattern: (?!.*waive|.*exclude|.*disclaim)(liable for.*consequential damages|liable for.*indirect damages|liable for.*special damages)
consequential_damages_allowed.explanation: Liability for consequential damages can result in unpredictable and substantial financial exposure
